details.title: Development of a low-cost integrated GPS/IMU system
details.abstract: This paper describes the development of a low-cost and small size integrated Global Positioning System (GPS)/inertial measurement unit (IMU). The developed strapdown Attitude and Heading Reference System (AHRS) is capable of providing attitude and heading accuracy at ±0.2 and ±0.4 degrees, respectively. The prototype of low-cost integrated GPS/IMU can give positioning accuracy of 10 metres
details.journal_title: IEEE Aerospace and Electronic Systems Magazine

keywords: strapdown attitude and heading reference system
